importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Kada Scott was last seen at her workplace on this date, marking the beginning of the investigation into her disappearance.
Two weeks after her disappearance, the remains were discovered in a shallow grave, indicating the timeline of the crime and the duration of Scott’s absence.
The news conference on this date revealed the arrest of suspect Keon King, the discovery of human remains, and updates on ongoing investigations.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period from October 4 to October 19, 2025, is central to the investigation, as it spans the timeline of Scott’s disappearance, the tracking of phone communications, and the eventual discovery of remains.

keyTakeAways: A 23-year-old woman, Kada Scott, went missing from Philadelphia on October 4, 2025.
Human remains believed to be Scott's were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school two weeks later.
Keon King, a 21-year-old man, was arrested and charged with kidnapping Scott and another woman, suggesting a pattern of criminal behavior.
Phone tracking led investigators to King, who was the last person known to have contact with Scott before she went offline.
King was previously charged in a domestic kidnapping case earlier in 2025, with charges withdrawn due to a missing witness, and now refiled.
Public tips, including one leading to a gold 1999 Toyota Camry, helped investigators locate key evidence linked to King.
The case is being investigated by the Philadelphia Police Department’s homicide division with FBI assistance.
Scott’s family has repeatedly urged the public to come forward with any information, emphasizing the importance of small details in solving the case.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, went missing on October 4, 2025, after leaving her workplace. Two weeks later, human remains believed to be hers were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school. Police identified Keon King, a 21-year-old man with a prior domestic kidnapping case, as the primary suspect due to phone tracking and contact records. He is now charged with Scott’s kidnapping and the earlier kidnapping of another woman, raising concerns about a pattern of behavior. Investigators believe Scott may have been in a gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King, and public tips have helped locate it. The case is being investigated by Philadelphia Police and with FBI assistance. The Scott family has urged the public to come forward with any information, emphasizing the importance of small details in solving the case.
title: Police Investigating Disappearance of Philadelphia Woman Say Tip Led Them to Shallow Grave with Human Remains
